channel.title: Ftp on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ftp on TLDRBins

item.title: FTP
item.description: Config Location /etc/vsftpd.conf Basic # Connect ftp 10.10.11.10 +---------------------+ | Anonymous login | +---------------------+ | Username: anonymous | | Password: (empty) | +---------------------+ # Over SSL lftp 10.10.11.10 # Fix cert error echo -n 'set ssl:verify-certificate no' >> ~/.lftp/rc # List ls # Switch to binary transfer mode bin # Download get <FILE> # Upload put <FILE> # Connect over tunnel passive # Exit quit Recusive download # anonymous login wget -r ftp://anonymous:@10.
